chunks.text:
# Extendicare

## Cleaning Audit/Tracking FormThis form can be used with both ASSURE (Foam) System and with GLO GERM (Fluorescence) System. Mark 5 – 8 high touch surfaces each audit; alternate high touch surfaces being audited each day.### Home
